page: NA60002: Design And Construction Of Ocean Structures

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Types of ship and offshore structures, Design requirements, Mission impact on design, Types of structural loading, Structural components, Design for production, Metal cutting and forming, Weld design, Welding techniques, Robotic welding, Weld induced distortion, defects and NDT, Production techniques â flow production, group technology, just-in-time, flexible manufacturing system, Material handling in shipyards.
